name: napstaserver
description: Runs a simple express server that lets people upload and download shit, whatever, gay

scripts.keygen: sudo openssl req -x509 -nodes -days 365 -newkey rsa:2048 -keyout ./selfsigned.key -out selfsigned.crt && sudo chown $USER selfsigned.key && sudo chown $USER selfsigned.crt
scripts.shredkeys: shred selfsigned.crt; shred selfsigned.key; rm selfsigned.crt; rm selfsigned.key

author: PotatoChronicler
